dynamic_elements.count_label: Number of music bands in Romania

dynamic_elements.chart_query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?label (COUNT(?item) AS ?count)
WHERE {
     ?band ?a wd:Q215380 . # music band 
     ?band wdt:P495 wd:Q218 . # from romania
     ?band wdt:P527 ?item . 
     SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".
          ?band rdfs:label         ?label.
      }



}
GROUP BY ?label
ORDER BY DESC(?count)
LIMIT 30

dynamic_elements.table_query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?Member ?MemberLabel (year(xsd:dateTime(?BirthDate)) as ?Birth) (year(xsd:dateTime(?DeathDate)) as ?Death) ?BirthPlace ?BirthPlaceLabel ?VoiceType ?VoiceTypeLabel 
WHERE { wd:Q1797517 wdt:P527 ?Member . ?Member 
                                      wdt:P569 ?BirthDate . 
OPTIONAL {?Member wdt:P570 ?DeathDate.} ?Member 
                                        wdt:P19 ?BirthPlace. 
OPTIONAL {?Member wdt:P412 ?VoiceType.} 
SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".} } 
LIMIT 10
